com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted

Class PersistentByteArrayStoreProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.PersistentByteArrayStoreProperties
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JournalingPersistentStoreProperties

    public abstract class PersistentByteArrayStoreProperties
extends Object
    Contains common property definitions shared by a number of persistent store implementations as well as utility methods for accessing properties.

      • getLongProperty

        public static long getLongProperty(Properties properties,
                                   String propertyName,
                                   long defaultValue,
                                   long minValue,
                                   long maxValue)
                            throws PersistenceConfigurationException
        Reads a long property from a set of properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to read from
        propertyName - the name of the property to read
        defaultValue - the property's default value
        minValue - the property's min value
        maxValue - the property's max value
        Returns:
        the property's value or the provided default value if the property is not set
        Throws:
        PersistenceConfigurationException - if the property's value is not a long or is not within the given bounds

      • getLongProperty

        public static long getLongProperty(Properties properties,
                                   String propertyName,
                                   long minValue,
                                   long maxValue)
                            throws PersistenceConfigurationException
        Reads a long property from a set of properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to read from
        propertyName - the name of the property to read
        minValue - the property's min value
        maxValue - the property's max value
        Returns:
        the property's value
        Throws:
        PersistenceConfigurationException - if either of the following occurs:
        • The property is missing.
        • The property's value is not a long.
        • The property's value is less than the min value.
